title: Madeline's detective school. Madeline and the Hunchback of Notre Dame
brief_description: Madeline decides to start a detective school to raise money for Miss Clavel’s birthday present but first she must discover who is sending her valuable gifts. “Madeline and the Hunchback of Notre Dame”: Madeline and her friends decide to stage a performance of the famous story and are lucky to get the assistance of the real Hunchback.
